id: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73.a) to vary condition 4 (removal) of planning permission ref: 252503FUL dated 05/11/2025 for: Single storey side/rear extensions, rear roof extensions incorporating Juliet balcony and rear outrigger roof extensions (Joint Application)
addr: 25 And 27 Argyle Road West Ealing W13 0LW

id: Single storey (Max 4.50m deep and Max 4m high) rear extension (42 days Prior Notification Process)

Change of use of the ground-floor from C4 (HMO) to Restaurant (Class E). Use of first and second floor as C4 (HMO). Two storey rear/side infill extension with an extension of the roof to create habitable space and installation of one roof light to the side roofslope.

Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 233076FUL dated: 27.05.2025 for 'Demolition of existing buildings and structures and the phased erection of buildings for mixed-use scheme, including new homes; a replacement food store; Flexible Commercial Space; alterations to the existing access road; associated improvements to streets, open spaces, landscaping and public realm; and provision of car and bicycle parking spaces and servicing spaces and other works incidental to the proposed development'. Amendments seek alteration of condition 33
addr: Waitrose 2 Alexandria Road West Ealing W13 0NL

id: Single storey rear extension; rear roof extension and installation of two rooflights to front roofslope (Lawful Development Certificate for a Proposed Development)

T1 and T2 Prunus trees - Crown reduce by approximately 4m in height and shape ensuring branches are no longer encroaching on building with a minimum of 2m clearance and sever Ivy at base and remove from main stem up to a height of 1.5m. T3 Yew tree - Laterally reduce by up to 3m (back to wall) branches that are encroaching on neighbouring property up to a height of 5m T4 Large Fig tree - Re-pollard tree that is on garden boundary
